mapper.sql: SELECT bno, title, contents, writer, view_cnt, reply_cnt, reg_date FROM board
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, contents, writer) VALUES (#{title}, #{contents}, #{writer})
mapper.select: ORDER BY reg_date DESC, bno DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select * FROM( select bno, title, contents, writer, view_cnt, reply_cnt, reg_date , row_number() over(order by reg_date desc, bno desc) as rum FROM board ) where (rum between ((#{page}-1) * #{pageSize}) and #{pageSize})
